posts.postText:
Your Minecraft ID: TravisMMM
Your Age: 14
How did you learn about Goldcraft: Been playing the NNJG TTT for about half a year, decided to check out the website, see server. Need server, and it sounds great so yeah.
Why do you want to join Goldcraft: I need a server to hang around in, staying in the same old ones gets boring, ya'' know?
Steam Profile URL: http://steamcommunity.com/id/glyptodon
Whitelisted, be sure to read the rules right outside of spawn.
